document_name: National strategy for the development of carbon-free hydrogen in France
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/FRA/2020/FRA-2020-08-09-National strategy for the development of carbon-free hydrogen in France_b6e47dee4700c055d5d07306c1ab798e.pdf
document_description: This document aims to 1) Decarbonise the industry sector by creating a national electrolysis sector, 2) Develop heavy mobility using carbon-free hydrogen, and 3) Support research, innovation and skills development in order to promote future uses.
